about_the_game:
[Introduction to the Game]
"Adventure of the Skullmancer" is an action-packed adventure game that combines elements of summoning and adorable cartoons. In this game, you will embark on a captivating journey as a lovable skeleton mage, summon friendly skeletons, battle various enemies, and explore a mysterious and dangerous world.

The game adopts the classic Rogue-like gameplay, where each adventure will face randomly generated maps and enemies. You must use your strategy and skills to survive in this world. As you progress through your journey, you will unlock more interesting skeletons and a variety of items to help you defeat your enemies.

"Adventure of the Skullmancer" features a cartoon pixel art style, with each character having a unique design. From the cute and lovable skeleton mage to charming monsters and pet companions, each character will captivate you. The game also offers a rich variety of maps and scenes, each filled with challenges and surprises waiting for you to explore.

In addition to exciting action combat and adventurous levels, the game also provides a rich item and upgrade system. You can enhance your abilities by collecting and upgrading items, making yourself stronger. There are also numerous challenges waiting for you to complete, unlocking more rewards and achievements.

Whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, "Journey of the Skeleton Mage" is easy to pick up. The game offers simple and smooth controls that immerse you in this fantastic adventure world.

Come and experience "Adventure of the Skullmancer," unravel the mysteries of this world, defeat enemies with adorable characters, and become a true adventure hero!

[Note]
This game was developed by a high school student within a month. The estimated gameplay duration is approximately 10 hours. The content displayed on the store page is from the early development stage and does not reflect the actual content. Updates will be made as soon as the game is released.
